'''1.7.3''' (displayed as release '''1.7.3''' in the launcher)  is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.7.4]],<ref>https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/69579395178/minecraft-173-174</ref><ref>{{url|url=https://mojang.com/2013/12/minecraft-1-7-3-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140122053031/https://mojang.com/2013/12/minecraft-1-7-3-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.7.4 Pre-release|author=Dinnerbone|date=December 6, 2013}}</ref> released on December 6, 2013.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|408962000581304320|It's here! Minecraft 1.7.3 pre-release is available for download, to be released early next week. https://mojang.com/2013/12/minecraft-1-7-3-pre-release/|December 6, 2013}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* This version is mislabeled as a release on the [[launcher]].
* This is the last pre-release to take the form of full releases.
* This is the last pre-release released in 2013.
* This is one of a few development versions that weren't removed from the launcher before September 2018. Other such versions are [[Java Edition 1.6.1|1.6.1]] development versions.
